title: Merge autobahn-wss and weberknecht-wss, but only keep the Autobahn version
message:
Merge autobahn-wss and weberknecht-wss, but only keep the Autobahn version

This is done to essentially undo the Weberknecht commits on the master
and make the Autobahn version the new master, without messing up remote
repos.
